function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Fragmented urban governance","Impact":"Lack of coordinated actions in response to contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Establishing a unified approach to disease containment and response","Technologies":"Data sharing and communication platforms for real-time information exchange","People":"City residents, healthcare professionals, and local businesses","Owner":"City mayors and local government officials"},{"Description":"Conflicting priorities of different government levels","Impact":"Confusion and lack of effectiveness in city-level actions","Mitigation":"Alignment of priorities and objectives through cross-government collaboration","Technologies":"Collaboration platforms and decision-making tools","People":"Government officials at different levels, public health experts","Owner":"Policy makers at national, state, and local government levels"},{"Description":"Limited financial resources for city-level governance","Impact":"Dependency on higher-level governments for funding and resources","Mitigation":"Advocacy for increased funding and resource allocation to city governments","Technologies":"Budgeting and resource allocation software, economic impact assessment tools","People":"City leaders, urban planners, local residents","Owner":"City government officials"}]}
